code: import React from'react';import'./FeaturesSection.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FeaturesSection=()=>{const features=[{icon:'LOCATION',title:'随时随地',subtitle:'场景多变',description:'支持室内外多种场景，灵活选择游戏场地'},{icon:'SOCIAL',title:'强社交',subtitle:'等级可视',description:'完善的等级系统和社交功能，让竞技更有趣'},{icon:'SHIELD',title:'安全合规',subtitle:'权益与保险',description:'专业教官指导，完善的保险保障，安全第一'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"features-section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"features-container",children:features.map((feature,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"feature-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"feature-icon",children:feature.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"feature-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"feature-title",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"title-main",children:feature.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"title-sub",children:feature.subtitle})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"feature-description",children:feature.description})]})]},index))})});};export default FeaturesSection;
